name: activity-feed-subgraph
description: Scrobble activity feed subgraph on MegaETH â€” dotheaven

scripts.build:tempo: graph codegen subgraph.tempo.yaml && graph build subgraph.tempo.yaml
scripts.build:tempo:local: graph codegen subgraph.tempo.local.yaml && graph build subgraph.tempo.local.yaml
scripts.deploy:tempo:local: graph deploy --version-label ${VERSION_LABEL:-local} --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 dotheaven/activity-feed-tempo subgraph.tempo.local.yaml
